name: Make Candy - Full Version by Bluebear
name_original: Make Candy - Full Version by Bluebear
description:
Bluebear's latest and greatest game "Pick 'n' Mix" a candy picker & creator has finally arrived to the Appstore!

Make and choose from a huge variety of sweets to create the candy combination of your dreams!

*** This is a brand new game from the Bluebear Collection. It joins our other popular titles including Candy Bars!, Cotton Candy!, IcePOPS!, and Make Soda! ***

Pick 'n' Mix lets you make your own candies from scratch but also pick and mix a huge variety of sweets like you would at an old Penny Candy store.

It's like being in a candy store, you get to choose a paper bag to hold all your candy, make you choose one thats big enough! Then you're straight to the candy stand where you can start scoopin'. Mix and match to fill your bag, making crazy candy combinations.

Once your done, its off the the bag weighing scales, to see if it passes the sweet tooth test!

Before you dig in and start devouring all your candy, you can decorate your bag with different color markers and silly stickers. Then its time to rip that bag open, and start stuffing your face with delicious candy!

At the end of all that, Just in case you're wondering, "Where does all the candy come from?" We've put in 3 candy creators so you can see how Candy Corn, Gummy Bears and Gum Drops are made! Each creator uses unique cooking processes.

If all you Bluebear fans like the individual candy creators, we'll keep adding new ones!

So lets go! Lets start SCOOPIN', get Pickin' 'n' Mixin' your favorite candy!
